titleStmt.title: Poems by several hands, and on several occasions collected by N. Tate.
titleStmt.author: Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.

notesStmt.note: Poems by Cowley, Rochester, Sir Francis Fane, P. Ayers, J. Evelyn, Waller, Tate, and others.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
